cgcloud__Account_Condition__c.name: cgcloud__Account_Condition__c
cgcloud__Account_Condition__c.description: Contains the details of the relationship between customer and the customer conditions.

cgcloud__Max_Value__c.description: The maximum header discount available to the customer in question.

cgcloud__Record_Link__c.description: Link to the detail page of the Customer Condition record.

cgcloud__Valid_From__c.description: The date from when the entry is valid.

cgcloud__Valid_Thru__c.description: The date until when the entry is valid.

cgcloud__Value__c.description: Holds the value of a condition.
